accomplishments: Implemented new scoring algorithm with confidence decay
Added comprehensive unit tests for decay calculations
Refactored bullet schema to support feedback events
Updated documentation with decay formula examples
decisions: Set default half-life to 90 days for most rules
preferences: Prefer TypeScript interfaces for complex types
keyLearnings: Confidence decay helps rules stay relevant over time
Harmful feedback should have stronger impact than helpful
Half-life should vary by rule type and stability

relatedSessions.snippet: Researched decay algorithms for trust scores
